creator: Amanda Silberling
title: (No AI) OpenAI removes access to sycophancy-prone GPT-4o model
dc:creator: Amanda Silberling
content: The model is known for its overly sycophantic nature and its role in several lawsuits involving users' unhealthy relationships to the chatbot.
contentSnippet: The model is known for its overly sycophantic nature and its role in several lawsuits involving users' unhealthy relationships to the chatbot.

creator: Anthony Ha, Kirsten Korosec, Sean O'Kane, Theresa Loconsolo
title: (No AI) AI burnout, billion-dollar bets, and Silicon Valley’s Epstein problem
dc:creator: Anthony Ha, Kirsten Korosec, Sean O'Kane, Theresa Loconsolo
content: AI companies have been hemorrhaging talent the past few weeks. Half of xAI’s founding team has left the company — some on their own, others through “restructuring” — while OpenAI is facing its own shakeups, from the disbanding of its mission alignment team to the firing of a policy exec who opposed its “adult mode” feature.  On this episode of TechCrunch’s Equity podcast, hosts Kirsten \[…\]
contentSnippet: AI companies have been hemorrhaging talent the past few weeks. Half of xAI’s founding team has left the company — some on their own, others through “restructuring” — while OpenAI is facing its own shakeups, from the disbanding of its mission alignment team to the firing of a policy exec who opposed its “adult mode” feature.  On this episode of TechCrunch’s Equity podcast, hosts Kirsten […]

title: (No AI) What’s behind the mass exodus at xAI?
author: Hayden Field
content:
![An image of Elon Musk on a gray striped background](https://platform.theverge.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2025/10/STK022_ELON_MUSK_CVIRGINIA_C.jpg?quality=90&strip=all&crop=0,0,100,100)

The past few days have been a wild ride for xAI, which is racking up staff and cofounder departure announcements left and right. On Tuesday and Wednesday, cofounder Yuhuai (Tony) Wu [announced](https://x.com/Yuhu_ai_/status/2021113745024614671?s=20) his departure and that it was "time for \[his\] next chapter," with cofounder Jimmy Ba following with a [similar post](https://x.com/jimmybajimmyba/status/2021374875793801447?s=20) later that day, writing that it was "time to recalibrate \[his\] gradient on the big picture." The departures mean that xAI is now left with [only half](https://www.reuters.com/business/two-co-founders-elon-musks-xai-resign-joining-exodus-2026-02-11/#:~:text=By%20Reuters,next%20plans%2C%20but%20thanked%20Musk.) of its original 12 cofounders on staff. [A](https://x.com/Chace_AGI/status/2021452881875141060?s=20) [number](https://x.com/hangg70/status/2021412690321924543?s=20) [of](https://x.com/ayushjaiswal/status/2019857451823296876?s=20) [staffers](https://x.com/simon_zhai/status/2020980340895121869?s=20) [also](https://x.com/textangel/status/2021718007433900230?s=46&t=fRkDIqgNCkTkvg8ZBiLA9A) took to X to announce they were leaving xAI, with some announcing that they were starting their own AI companies.

Elon Musk's …

[Read the full story at The Verge.](https://www.theverge.com/ai-artificial-intelligence/878761/mass-exodus-at-xai-grok-elon-musk-restructuring)
contentSnippet:
The past few days have been a wild ride for xAI, which is racking up staff and cofounder departure announcements left and right. On Tuesday and Wednesday, cofounder Yuhuai (Tony) Wu announced his departure and that it was "time for [his] next chapter," with cofounder Jimmy Ba following with a similar post later that day, writing that it was "time to recalibrate [his] gradient on the big picture." The departures mean that xAI is now left with only half of its original 12 cofounders on staff. A number of staffers also took to X to announce they were leaving xAI, with some announcing that they were starting their own AI companies. 
Elon Musk's …
Read the full story at The Verge.

title: (No AI) Ring’s adorable surveillance hellscape
author: David Pierce
content:
![](https://platform.theverge.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2026/02/VRG_VST_021326_Site.jpg?quality=90&strip=all&crop=0,0,100,100)

You can watch Ring's recent Super Bowl ad and see a cute story about dogs being reunited with their families. You can also watch the very same ad and [see the seeds being planted](https://www.theverge.com/tech/876866/ring-search-party-super-bowl-ad-online-backlash) for a massively connected, utterly ubiquitous surveillance system that will end the concept of privacy forever. Maybe you can even see both at the same time.

![](https://platform.theverge.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2025/11/Vergecast-Tile-Large.jpeg?quality=90&strip=all&crop=0,0,100,100)

_Verge_ subscribers, don't forget you get exclusive access to ad-free _Vergecast_ wherever you get your podcasts. Head [here](https://www.theverge.com/account/podcasts). Not a subscriber? You can [sign up here](https://www.theverge.com/subscribe).

On [this episode of _The Vergecast_](https://pod.link/vergecast), Nilay and David talk about the Super Bowl ad that worried so many people, why Ring would build a feature like th …

[Read the full story at The Verge.](https://www.theverge.com/podcast/878797/ring-super-bowl-ad-backlash-epstein-files-chatgpt-vergecast)

title: (No AI) GPT-5.2 derives a new result in theoretical physics
content: A new preprint shows GPT-5.2 proposing a new formula for a gluon amplitude, later formally proved and verified by OpenAI and academic collaborators.
contentSnippet: A new preprint shows GPT-5.2 proposing a new formula for a gluon amplitude, later formally proved and verified by OpenAI and academic collaborators.

title: (No AI) Introducing Lockdown Mode and Elevated Risk labels in ChatGPT
content: Introducing Lockdown Mode and Elevated Risk labels in ChatGPT to help organizations defend against prompt injection and AI-driven data exfiltration.

creator: Steven Levy
title: (No AI) Zillow Has Gone Wild—for AI
dc:creator: Steven Levy
content: As the housing market stalls, Zillow’s CEO sees AI as “an ingredient rather than a threat” that can both help the company protect its turf and reinvent how people search for homes.
contentSnippet: As the housing market stalls, Zillow’s CEO sees AI as “an ingredient rather than a threat” that can both help the company protect its turf and reinvent how people search for homes.

creator: Brittany Spanos
title: (No AI) Inside the New York City Date Night for AI Lovers
dc:creator: Brittany Spanos
content: EVA AI created a pop-up romantic date night at a Manhattan wine bar to help making AI-human relationships a “new normal.”
contentSnippet: EVA AI created a pop-up romantic date night at a Manhattan wine bar to help making AI-human relationships a “new normal.”
